roleset.name: send a message electronically
roleset.note: EMAIL-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from email.01-v)
EMAIL-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry email.01; no corresponding VN entry. No instances found with message thus far, see verb frame for semantics if you need to... (from email.01-n)

example.name: no message with manner
example.text: You can...email us by *PRO*-1 going to out website ~CNN dot com slash Three Sixty.
example.arg: by *PRO*-1 going to our website ~CNN dot come slash Three Sixty.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: I-1 'm also learning a lot about computers like %um like about other things about computers like about %um you know how-2 PRO-1 to do email *T*-2 and how to do like Email 's interesting . networking

example.name: Args 0 & 2
example.text: In her email to the Apple CEO, Fiona shared that ?all the other kids think it's awesome that she gets an iPad!?
